languages.text: Обслуживающий клан охладительных систем сообщил о ведьмовском наваждении: тени в коридорах и каютах их палубы оживают! Странные бесовские твари таятся по темным углам и щелям на самой границе взгляда. Стоит отвернуться, как они расползаются по помещению, обгладывая все на своем пути и нападая исподтишка на слабых и больных. Ловить странных существ бесполезно: они словно чувствуют, что на них смотрят, и скрываются в многочисленных тенях среди переборок и механизмов.

The clan servicing the cooling systems have reported an incident of sorcery: the shadows in the cabins and corridors are coming to life! The voidsmen say they see strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of their vision. If they look away, the things spread over the room, gnawing on everything in their path and attacking the weak and infirm. The strange creatures cannot be caught, it is almost as if they sense they are being watched and sink into the many cracks between the machines and bulkheads.
languages.original_text: Обслуживающий клан охладительных систем сообщил о ведьмовском наваждении: тени в коридорах и каютах их палубы оживают! Странные бесовские твари таятся по темным углам и щелям на самой границе взгляда. Стоит отвернуться, как они расползаются по помещению, обгладывая все на своем пути и нападая исподтишка на слабых и больных. Ловить странных существ бесполезно: они словно чувствуют, что на них смотрят, и скрываются в многочисленных тенях среди переборок и механизмов.

traits.locale_text: The clan servicing cooling systems reported an evil sorcery: the shadows in cabins and corridors are coming to life! Strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of vision. If you look away, they spread over the room gnawing on everything in their path and attacking the weak and infirm. The strange creatures cannot be caught, it is almost like they anticipate being watched and sink into the many cracks between machines and bulkheads.

The clan servicing cooling systems reported an evil sorcery: the shadows in cabins and corridors are coming to life! Strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of vision. If you look away, they spread over the room gnawing on everything in their path and attacking the weak and infirm. The strange creatures cannot be caught, it is almost like they anticipate being watched and sink into the many cracks between machines and bulkheads.

The voidsmen say they see strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of their vision. If they look away, the things spread over the room, gnawing on everything in their path and attacking the weak and infirm. The strange creatures cannot be caught, it is almost as if they sense they are being watched and sink into the many cracks between the machines and bulkheads.

The voidsmen say they see strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of their vision. If they look away, the things spread over the room, gnawing on everything in their path and attacking the weak and infirm. The voidsmen say they see strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of their vision. If they look away, the things spread over the room, gnawing on everything in their path and attacking the weak and infirm. languages.text: 负责冷却系统的氏族报告了一起巫术事件——船舱和走廊里的影子活了过来！据他们所言，古怪的扭动之物潜伏在他们视野边缘的角落与缝隙里。一旦他们移开目光，这些怪物就会填满整个房间，啃食它们遇到的一切东西，袭击体弱多病的人。这些古怪的生物根本无法抓获，似乎一旦感觉到有人在看着它们，就会钻进机器与舱壁之间的裂缝里。
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the cooling systems have reported an incident of sorcery: the shadows in the cabins and corridors are coming to life! The voidsmen say they see strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of their vision. If they look away, the things spread over the room, gnawing on everything in their path and attacking the weak and infirm. The strange creatures cannot be caught, it is almost as if they sense they are being watched and sink into the many cracks between the machines and bulkheads.

traits.locale_text: 负责冷却系统的氏族报告了一起巫术事件——船舱和走廊里的影子活了过来！据他们所言，古怪的扭动之物潜伏在他们视野边缘的角落与缝隙里。一旦他们移开目光，这些怪物就会填满整个房间，啃食它们遇到的一切东西，袭击体弱多病的人。这些古怪的生物根本无法抓获，似乎一旦感觉到有人在看着它们，就会钻进机器与舱壁之间的裂缝里。

languages.text: El clan encargado del mantenimiento de los sistemas de refrigeración ha informado de un incidente relacionado con la brujería: ¡las sombras de los camarotes y los pasillos están cobrando vida! Los soldados del vacío dicen que ven unos seres extraños que se retuercen en los rincones de su campo de visión. Si apartan la vista, se extienden por la habitación, royendo todo lo que encuentran a su paso y atacando a los débiles y enfermos. Las extrañas criaturas no pueden ser atrapadas, es casi como si se sintieran observadas y se ocultaran en las numerosas grietas entre las máquinas y los muros.
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the cooling systems have reported an incident of sorcery: the shadows in the cabins and corridors are coming to life! The voidsmen say they see strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of their vision. If they look away, the things spread over the room, gnawing on everything in their path and attacking the weak and infirm. The strange creatures cannot be caught, it is almost as if they sense they are being watched and sink into the many cracks between the machines and bulkheads.

traits.locale_text: El clan encargado del mantenimiento de los sistemas de refrigeración ha informado de un incidente relacionado con la brujería: ¡las sombras de los camarotes y los pasillos están cobrando vida! Los soldados del vacío dicen que ven unos seres extraños que se retuercen en los rincones de su campo de visión. Si apartan la vista, se extienden por la habitación, royendo todo lo que encuentran a su paso y atacando a los débiles y enfermos. Las extrañas criaturas no pueden ser atrapadas, es casi como si se sintieran observadas y se ocultaran en las numerosas grietas entre las máquinas y los muros.

languages.text: 冷却システムを管理する一族から、魔術を感じる事件の報告があった。キャビンや通路の影が動き出している！ヴォイズマンの話によると、異様にうごめくものが片隅に身を潜め、視界の端には割れ目が見えると言う。彼らが目を逸らすと、ソレは空間中に広がって、道にある全てのものを蝕み、弱く衰えた者を攻撃するのだとか。その奇妙な生物は捕まえることができず、まるで監視されている事を感じ取り、機械や壁の間にあるいくつもの隙間に引っ込むようなのだ。
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the cooling systems have reported an incident of sorcery: the shadows in the cabins and corridors are coming to life! The voidsmen say they see strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of their vision. If they look away, the things spread over the room, gnawing on everything in their path and attacking the weak and infirm. The strange creatures cannot be caught, it is almost as if they sense they are being watched and sink into the many cracks between the machines and bulkheads.

traits.locale_text: 冷却システムを管理する一族から、魔術を感じる事件の報告があった。キャビンや通路の影が動き出している！ヴォイズマンの話によると、異様にうごめくものが片隅に身を潜め、視界の端には割れ目が見えると言う。彼らが目を逸らすと、ソレは空間中に広がって、道にある全てのものを蝕み、弱く衰えた者を攻撃するのだとか。その奇妙な生物は捕まえることができず、まるで監視されている事を感じ取り、機械や壁の間にあるいくつもの隙間に引っ込むようなのだ。

languages.text: Le clan chargé de la maintenance du système de refroidissement a signalé un incident aussi mystérieux qu'inquiétant : les ombres des cabines et des couloirs semblent s'animer ! Les cosmomarins jurent avoir vu du coin de l'œil d'étranges entités se tapir dans les recoins du vaisseau. Dès qu'ils détournent le regard, ces choses se répandent dans la pièce et rongent tout ce qu'elles trouvent. Pire encore, elles s'en prennent aux faibles et aux infirmes. Les entités doivent se sentir observées, car dès que l'on tente de mettre la main dessus, elles se réfugient dans les fissures entre machines et cloisons.
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the cooling systems have reported an incident of sorcery: the shadows in the cabins and corridors are coming to life! The voidsmen say they see strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of their vision. If they look away, the things spread over the room, gnawing on everything in their path and attacking the weak and infirm. The strange creatures cannot be caught, it is almost as if they sense they are being watched and sink into the many cracks between the machines and bulkheads.

traits.locale_text: Le clan chargé de la maintenance du système de refroidissement a signalé un incident aussi mystérieux qu'inquiétant : les ombres des cabines et des couloirs semblent s'animer ! Les cosmomarins jurent avoir vu du coin de l'œil d'étranges entités se tapir dans les recoins du vaisseau. Dès qu'ils détournent le regard, ces choses se répandent dans la pièce et rongent tout ce qu'elles trouvent. Pire encore, elles s'en prennent aux faibles et aux infirmes. Les entités doivent se sentir observées, car dès que l'on tente de mettre la main dessus, elles se réfugient dans les fissures entre machines et cloisons.

languages.text: Der Clan, der die Kühlsysteme wartet, hat einen magischen Zwischenfall gemeldet: Die Schatten in den Kabinen und Gängen erwachen zum Leben! Die Raumfahrer sagen, dass in Winkeln und Ecken merkwürdige Wesen lauern, die sie immer nur aus den Augenwinkeln sehen. Wenn sie wegblicken, breiten die Kreaturen sich im Raum aus, nagen alles an, was ihnen im Weg steht, und attackieren Schwache und Kranke. Die seltsamen Wesen lassen sich nicht fangen. Es ist fast, als würden sie spüren, wenn sie angesehen werden, und daraufhin schnell in den vielen Ritzen zwischen den Maschinen und Schotten verschwinden.
languages.original_text: The clan servicing the cooling systems have reported an incident of sorcery: the shadows in the cabins and corridors are coming to life! The voidsmen say they see strange writhing things lurk in nooks and crannies at the edge of their vision. The strange creatures cannot be caught, it is almost as if they sense they are being watched and sink into the many cracks between the machines and bulkheads.
